text:
He’s her amor…

As they headed out of New York Town’s JFK airport on Saturday, Shakira 40, and Gerard Piqué, 30, had been stuck getting all snuggly on the tail finish in their Christmas holiday. Cue the melting of hearts all over the world.

The PDA-tastic pair used to be noticed leaving the Giant Apple forward of Sunday’s New Yr’s Eve celebrations. Looks as if the oldsters of 2, who were given in combination in 2010, are nonetheless all about each and every different…

The lovable couple, who had been bundled up for the chilly, flew out of the Town that By no means Sleeps with their younger sons Milan, four, and Sasha, 2. The circle of relatives of 4 arrived in NYC on Dec. 24.

The South American singer and Spanish football participant met at the set of Shakira’s son “Waka Waka,” which used to be the professional 2010 FIFA International Cup track.
title: Shakira and Gerard Piqué Cuddle Up in the Cold During Vacation
